metadata.title: CVE-2020-13276 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: User is allowed to set an email as a notification email even withoutverifying the new email in all previous GitLab CE/EE versions through13.0.1

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
